entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023
